text: Soni ndema jakusoomedwa kukwao ma Aya Getu gakupikanika, tinkuone kungope kwa awala wakanile kunyalaisidwa (kwakanila), akusigalaga panandi kwatenda uwanga awala waakwaasoomela ma Aya Getu. Jilani: “Ana nantagulile yakusakala nnope kumpunda yalakweyo? Moto (wa Jahannama) waatawene nao Allah chilanga awala waakanile. Kaje kusakala nnope malo gakuujila gakwe!”
